home.sub_title_header: Infographics, videos, books, consults with healers and workshops
home.about_platform_description_line1: We are a healing platform that considers different healing approaches providing alternatives for people to freelly choose what makes sense for each one.
home.about_platform_description_line2: We have incorporated ancestral approaches, such as Mapuche (Chile), Quero (Andes) and also acupuncture (Chinese ancestral medicine), reading Akashic Records and astrological chart. In addition, we beleive in a collaborative and amorous approach, we have also incorporated Western conventional medicine.
home.to_whom_directed_line_1: To those people who do not find the answers to their ailments in conventional medicine.
home.to_whom_directed_line_2: To those who feel with certainty that diseases are related to the emotions and the spirit.
home.to_whom_directed_line_3: To those of us who believe that we are body, mind and spirit and do not want to be treated as Clients anymore.
home.approach_1_description: Integrative medicines considers body, mind, and spirit from differentperspective. It also can incorporate energies coming from the universe(planets and Superior Energies).
home.approach_2_description: Ancestral medicines are those performed by Native People from different parts of the world and considers spirit, emotions, and body. Highly influenced by herbs treatments.
home.approach_3_description: Traditional Chinese medicine seeks balance in the body and harmony between the natural forces of yin and yang, which could be blocking the person's qi (energy) and causing illness.
home.approach_4_description: A system by which doctors and other health care professionals (for example, nurses, pharmacists, and therapists) treat symptoms and illnesses using drugs, radiation, or surgery.
home.what_Will_find_description: From the easiest to the more complex to guide you in your healing process.
home.who_we_are_description: We are a group of healers, from different cultures, from different American Native tribes contributing to the healing of our souls and body. I had a dream back in 2016 where I visualized the name of our start up Matchetune, which is a word game in English and Mapuzungun (mapuches language): In English you read: Match, between us, others and mother nature + “e” of technology + Tune, to make fine tunning with ancestral healing and worldview. In Spanish you read: machitun, which is a healing ritual performed inside a Ruka (tend) where the Machi (mapuche healer) connect with spirits and heal. Join our matchetune!
